clan-mech-savagewolf.name: Clan
clan-mech-savagewolf.description:
The way the Clans fought was well reflected in the designs of their Battlemechs, often being shown by how quick and maneuverable they were.

C.A.S.E. protection on all components.

OTOMO1.name: Otomo
OTOMO1.description: The Otomo is an elite force of the finest mechs the Draconis Combine has to offer.

SOLARIS.name: Solaris
SOLARIS.description: Solaris contestants add various non-standard upgrades to their 'Mechs, improving stats but incurring very high costs to keep them running.

EXTENDED-TORSO-TWIST.name: Extended Torso Twist
EXTENDED-TORSO-TWIST.description: This 'mech is capable of twisting their torso sections much further than the average.

UAV-CARRIER.name: UAV Carrier
UAV-CARRIER.description: This 'Mech has a built-in compartment for standard UAV drone(s).

AIV-PLATFORM.name: Arrow IV Platform
AIV-PLATFORM.description: This specific 'Mech was modified to be a Arrow IV platform, and has improved AIV efficiency

ANTIAIR-TARGETING.name: Anti-Air Targeting
ANTIAIR-TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle (using on Navid A1's predictive TC code) when targeting VTOLs

PREDICTIVE-TARGETING.name: Predictive Targeting
PREDICTIVE-TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has an targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle (using on Navid A1's predictive TC code).

BARREL-FIST (L).name: Barrel Fist LA
BARREL-FIST (L).description: This BattleMech has been designed to be able to use an arm in melee combat despite the lack of a hand actuator.

BARREL-FIST (R).name: Barrel Fist RA
BARREL-FIST (R).description: This BattleMech has been designed to be able to use an arm in melee combat despite the lack of a hand actuator.

BARREL-FISTS.name: Barrel Fists
BARREL-FISTS.description: This BattleMech has been designed to be able to use an arm in melee combat despite the lack of a hand actuator.

BATTLECOMP.name: Battle Computer
BATTLECOMP.description: The Tacticon B-2000 Battle Computer extends sensor range

BATTLEFISTS.name: Battlefists
BATTLEFISTS.description: The Hand actuators of a 'Mech with Battlefists have been specially modified for close combat

CBTCPU.name: Combat Computer
CBTCPU.description: This 'mech possesses an advanced combat computer.

CLANBUSTER.name: Clanbuster
CLANBUSTER.description: A ComStar designed refit for the Battle of Tukayyid, featuring the latest tech to withstand against the Clans.

COMPACT.name: Compact 'Mech
COMPACT.description: This 'Mech is small enough that two of its kind are able to fit in the same storage space as one regular 'Mech.

COWL.name: Cowl
COWL.description: This mech has a cowl around its cockpit resulting in increased head armor

CRAMPED-COCKPIT.name: Cramped Cockpit
CRAMPED-COCKPIT.description: This 'Mech has an uncomfortably small cockpit that makes it unpleasant to pilot

DIFFICULT-EJECT.name: Difficult Ejection
DIFFICULT-EJECT.description: This 'Mech has flaws in its emergency escape system, significantly increasing the chance for the pilot to die in an ejection event.

NO-EJECT.name: No Ejection
NO-EJECT.description: This 'Mech has no ejection system. The pilot has minimal chance to survive if the 'Mech goes down.

DIFFICULTTOMAINTAIN.name: Difficult To Maintain
DIFFICULTTOMAINTAIN.description: This 'Mech is built with little regard to maintenance

DISTRACTING.name: Distracting
DISTRACTING.description: This 'Mech has a fearsome reputation and/or appearance that can affect enemy competence

EASYTOMAINTAIN.name: Easy To Maintain
EASYTOMAINTAIN.description: This 'Mech is designed for easy maintenance

EASY-PILOT.name: Easy to Pilot
EASY-PILOT.description: This 'Mech is designed to be used by the Greenest pilots and gets a bonus to Piloting Skill

ENERGYPROF.name: Energy Proficiency
ENERGYPROF.description: This 'Mech chassis has optimized components for all Energy type weapons.

ENF-AC10.name: Improved Cooling AC/10
ENF-AC10.description: The Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon it is applied to

ENF-AC20.name: Improved Cooling AC/20
ENF-AC20.description: The Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon it is applied to

ENF-UAC5.name: Improved Cooling UAC/5
ENF-UAC5.description: The Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon it is applied to

EXP-ACTUATOR.name: Exposed Actuators
EXP-ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech has fragile ankle actuators making it an easier target for leg attacks

EXPOSED-LINKAGE.name: Exposed Weapon Linkage
EXPOSED-LINKAGE.description: This 'Mech has fragile arm actuators making it an easier target for arm attacks

EXPOSED-LINKAGERT.name: Exposed Weapon Linkage (RT)
EXPOSED-LINKAGERT.description: This 'Mech has fragile arm actuators making it an easier target for arm attacks

FAST-RELOAD-RARM.name: Fast Reload (RA)
FAST-RELOAD-RARM.description: Shortened reload time for right arm mounted weapons

FAST-RELOAD-TORSO.name: Fast Reload (Torso)
FAST-RELOAD-TORSO.description: Shortened reload time for torso-mounted weapons

FULL-TWIST.name: 360 Torso Twist
FULL-TWIST.description: This 'Mech can freely twist its torso a full 360 degrees

HARD-PILOT.name: Hard to Pilot
HARD-PILOT.description: This 'Mech is designed to be used by expert pilots and gets a penalty to Piloting Skill

HYPER-EXT-ACTUATOR.name: Hyper-Extending Actuators
HYPER-EXT-ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech can point its arms into the rear arc

IMPROVED-COMS.name: Improved Communications
IMPROVED-COMS.description: This 'Mech has an exceptionally powerful communications suite and gains a benefit to sensor range

IMP-COOLING-B.name: Improved Cooling Jacket
IMP-COOLING-B.description: An Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon group it is applied to

IMP-COOLING-BINARY.name: Improved Cooling Jacket
IMP-COOLING-BINARY.description: An Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon group it is applied to

IMP-LIFE-SUPPORT.name: Improved Life Support
IMP-LIFE-SUPPORT.description: This 'Mech has enhanced defenses for the pilot

IMPROVED-TARGETING.name: Improved Targeting
IMPROVED-TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has a robust targeting system that makes it easier to hit enemy targets.

IMPROVED-TARGETING-MEDIUM.name: Improved Targeting (Medium)
IMPROVED-TARGETING-MEDIUM.description:
This mech has superior medium-range targeting equipment.
This includes Medium Laser, Medium Pulse Laser, ER Small Laser, Snub PPC, MRM, AC/10, LBX/10, UAC/10 and Heavy Gauss.

IMPROVED-TARGETING-LONG.name: Improved Targeting (Long)
IMPROVED-TARGETING-LONG.description:
This mech has superior long-range targeting equipment.
This includes LRM, ER laser, ER PPC, AC/2, LBX/2, UAC/2, RAC2, AC/5, LBX/5, UAC/5, RAC5, Gauss, Light and Hyper Assault Gauss.

JAM-LARM.name: Ammo Feed Problem (LA)
JAM-LARM.description: Increased jam chance for the weapons in the left arm

JAM-RARM.name: Ammo Feed Problem (RA)
JAM-RARM.description: Increased jam chance for the weapons in the right arm

MELEE.name: Melee Specialization
MELEE.description: This 'Mech is designed or upgraded for melee combat

MGAMMO1.name: Bonus Ammo
MGAMMO1.description: This 'Mech is capable of storing more ammo for machineguns

LONGBOWMISSILE.name: Longbow Missiles
LONGBOWMISSILE.description: This 'Mech was designed to be a Missile platform, and has improved Missile efficiency

MISSILEBOAT.name: Missile Platform
MISSILEBOAT.description: This 'Mech was designed to be a Missile platform, and has improved Missile efficiency

MODULAR-WEAPONS.name: Modular Weapons
MODULAR-WEAPONS.description: Weapons can be repaired and replaced in half the normal time, reducing overall maintenance times

MOUNT-RT.name: Directional Torso Mount (RT)
MOUNT-RT.description: Shortened reload time for torso-mounted weapons

MULTITRAC.name: Multi-Trac
MULTITRAC.description: This 'Mech is capable of keeping track of multiple targets at the same time.

NARROW-PROFILE.name: Narrow Profile
NARROW-PROFILE.description: The unit is constructed to present a very narrow or low profile to any incoming fire, with a chance to complete negate damage.

NIMBLEJUMPER.name: Nimble Jumper
NIMBLEJUMPER.description: This 'Mech is designed to be more effective with Jump Jets

NON-STANDARD-PARTS.name: Non-Standard Parts
NON-STANDARD-PARTS.description: This 'Mech is constructed with non-standard components such that replacement parts are not readily available

POOR-LIFE-SUPPORT.name: Poor Life Support
POOR-LIFE-SUPPORT.description: This 'Mech has reduced defenses for the pilot

PROTECTED-ACTUATOR.name: Protected Actuators
PROTECTED-ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech has reinforced ankle actuators making it a tougher target for leg attacks.

REINFORCEDCOCKPIT.name: Reinforced Cockpit
REINFORCEDCOCKPIT.description: This 'Mech's cockpit is well hidden inside its structure, making it resistant to damage

REINFORCED-LEGS.name: Reinforced Legs
REINFORCED-LEGS.description: This 'Mech is less susceptible to leg damage

RUGGED1.name: Rugged (1)
RUGGED1.description: This 'Mech does not require much attention to keep it active and ready.

RUGGED2.name: Rugged (2)
RUGGED2.description: This 'Mech does not require much attention to keep it active and ready.

SEARCHLIGHT.name: Searchlight
SEARCHLIGHT.description: This 'Mech has been fitted with a high-powered searchlight

SLDF.name: Star League Relic
SLDF.description: The Star League Defense Force used the best tech of their time

STABLE.name: Stable
STABLE.description: This 'Mech is inherently stable and gets a bonus to mobility

STABILIZED-WEAPON.name: Stabilized Weapon
STABILIZED-WEAPON.description: This 'Mech has been designed to reduce recoil of fired weapons, effectively reducing weapon spread

STEALTH_ARMOR.name: Stealth Armor
STEALTH_ARMOR.description: The Mech carries a Stealth Armor system, which allows it to reduce its radar signature and makes the 'Mech harder to target.

UBIQUITOUS.name: Ubiquitous
UBIQUITOUS.description: This 'Mech has been in production for centuries or is otherwise so heavily mass-produced that replacement parts are readily available

UNBALANCED.name: Unbalanced
UNBALANCED.description: This 'Mech is inherently imbalanced and suffers a penalty to mobility

WEAK-HEAD-1.name: Weak Head Armor (1)
WEAK-HEAD-1.description: This 'Mech has less potential and maximum armor protecting its cockpit than typical

WEAK-HEAD-2.name: Weak Head Armor (2)
WEAK-HEAD-2.description: This 'Mech has less potential and maximum armor protecting its cockpit than typical

WEAK-LEGS.name: Weak Legs
WEAK-LEGS.description: This 'Mech has legs that buckle under pressure

FIRESTARTER.name: Firestarter
FIRESTARTER.description: This 'Mech has optimized components for all Flamer type weapons.

LOCUST.name: Locust
LOCUST.description: The Locust is a surprisingly efficient mech
